title: Battery is old enough and replacement needed!
content:
After 2 years usage, my battery of Pixel 2 XL is old and its life drained very fast, the situation goes steadily downhill  that can not  support a daily usage as usual , this phone's warranty deadline is 2019/10/30, the repair center Live Chat is always unavailable.

I did factory reset and self mode to test them all, nothing changes.
This is simply a hardward problem of consumables.

Could you help me?
